[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@wixc3/engine-test-kit](./engine-test-kit.md) &gt; [IFeatureExecutionOptions](./engine-test-kit.ifeatureexecutionoptions.md) &gt; [featureName](./engine-test-kit.ifeatureexecutionoptions.featurename.md)

## IFeatureExecutionOptions.featureName property

feature file name scoped to feature root directory. if feature name is the same as folder name, scoping is unnecessary.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
featureName?: string;
```

## Example

given the following structure:

--my-feature -- feature -- my-feature.feature.ts -- my-feature2.feature.ts -- fixtures -- my-feature-fixture.feature.ts possible feature names will be: `my-feature` `my-feature/my-feature1` `my-feature/my-feature-fixture`
